alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Itawamba; Lafayette; Lee; Pontotoc; Prentiss; Tallahatchie; Tishomingo; Union; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 3:05AM CST until January 16 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 5 below zero. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of North Mississippi. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST Tuesday. For the Winter Storm Warning, until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Itawamba; Lafayette; Lee; Pontotoc; Prentiss; Tallahatchie; Tishomingo; Union; Yalobusha
